alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 1:22PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: Current split window dust imagery is displaying a large swath of blowing dust over the southeastern portion of Saguache County and northern Alamosa County, in vicinity of Great Sand Dunes National Park. Use extreme caution as this may cause very poor visibilities at times if commuting on Highway 150 for the next several hours. Be advised that while there are currently no areas of blowing dust showing up over the far northern and southern portions of the San Luis Valley, these areas could also be impacted by blowing dust and restricted visibilities through the early evening hours.

area.areaDesc: Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Del Norte Vicinity, Northern San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley
